definition: to trust one another fully/to treat sb with sincerity
flat/open-hearted/level/smooth
sincere/authentic/really/truly
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: Don't expect new acquaintances to be completely honest about themselves.
sentences.chinese: 不要期望认识不久的人会坦诚相见。

sentences.english: Everybody met each other candidly and encouraged each other in the entirely course of discussing.
sentences.chinese: 在整个讨论过程中大家坦诚相见，互相鼓励。

sentences.english: If how well by treating candid that of meeting each other sincerely we are.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们可以真诚对待坦诚相见那有多好。

sentences.english: Let's be open with each other.
sentences.chinese: 让我们彼此坦诚相见吧。

sentences.english: Friends should be honest with each other.
Friends should be frank with each other.
Absence of honesty resulted in the failure of the conference.
sentences.chinese: 由于他不能坦诚相见，所以导致了会议的失败。

sentences.english: Wholeheartedly welcome faithful cooperation from men of insight of all circles.
sentences.chinese: 谒诚欢迎各界有识之士坦诚相见，真诚合作。

sentences.english: Let others know what your intentions are and be honest in your approach.
sentences.chinese: 让别人知道你的意图，坦诚相见。

definition: candidly sharing confidences
to treat utterly sincerely/open and above board in dealing with sb
candid/frank/plain dealing
to give one's bare heart into sb else's keeping (idiom); sb has one's absolute confidence/to trust completely/to confide in sb with entire sincerity
to share the bed/(fig.) to be married
variant of 開誠布公|开诚布公[kai1 cheng2 bu4 gong1]
lit. deal sincerely and fairly (idiom); frank and open-minded/plain speaking/Let's talk frankly and openly between ourselves./to put one's cards on the table
to expose/to bare
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
to confide in each other (idiom)
to talk intimately while being comparative strangers (idiom)
each other/one another
the pleasure of close intimacy in a couple (idiom)/sexual intercourse
lit. fluently saying all one wants (idiom); to preach freely on one's favorite topic/to hold forth to one's heart's content
not to hold anything back (idiom)/(of close friends etc) to tell each other everything
candid and open (idiom)
to coexist/to get along (with others)
